The Vermont Statutes Online

Title 9: Commerce and Trade

Chapter 063: Consumer Protection

Subchapter 001: General Provisions

§ 2451. Purpose

§ 2451. Purpose

The purpose of this chapter is to complement federal consumer protection law.

Added 1967, No. 93, § 1.

§ 2451a. Definitions

§ 2451a. Definitions

As used in this chapter, consumer means a person who purchases goods or services.

See section 2452 of this chapter.

Amended 2019, No. 37, § 4.

§ 2452. Unfair acts and practices prohibited

§ 2452. Unfair acts and practices prohibited

Unfair methods of competition in commerce are declared unlawful.

Formerly 9 V.S.A. § 2452.
